art.author: christine
art.post: What a good little book!  I will donate my copy to my local library.  This morning I was sitting on my back porch.  I looked at the beautiful blue sky and thought, “YES, God is everywhere present!”.  (From Chapter 18)
art.title: Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Turin Shroud

art.author: christine
art.post: The photo, the book is amazing. I have been so torn the last month.  My ex..the father of my daughter committed suicide a month ago.  He could not take the pain anymore.  I have had  a lot of questions on if people do go to Heaven, or are they just dead and unaware until Christ returns.  Is there really a Heaven?  I have been able to find much comfort in this picture and book.  I know my ex has his Angel wings and is watching over our daughter.
